items.value: Oh hey, you're awake!  Loading Human Flattery program...  I got bored of being out here alone and you meat sacks are oh so interesting. How are you? Great thank you.
I woke you because something incredible has happened!  It's been 10 years since the incident and finally we have ventured upon something... breath taking!  No... Breath MAKING!
I thawed you from CONDITION: Meat Popsicle because I have found a way to keep you alive and unfortunately, I need your help.
These blue chunks have started showing up. First it was one or two a day...  now we're hitting HUNDREDS a day! I have analyzed them to be pure water ice.
Your cryo-pod had magnet boots. This is great because humans like you tend to fly off in space and die. I can't have that. '
You'll notice your oxygen is running low.  I can extract oxygen from the ice chunks! I don't know where they're coming from but while you're awake, you can help me fix this situation.
I'm boring you, aren't I?  Point is: jump off and grab blue ice chunks. My thermal processor converts them to oxygen. Don't die!
Excellent! You're not completely hopeless. Keep collecting ice!
Two down! One more ice chunk and you'll understand the concept.
Tutorial Complete.  Now we need something more sustainable than manually collecting space ice like a cosmic janitor.
60 seconds left! Those ice chunks aren't going to collect themselves!
30 SECONDS! I'd suggest panicking now.
Well, that was predictable.  You're dead. Try again?
Tiny ice chunk processed! +10 seconds. Better than nothing, I suppose.
Ice chunk processed! +30 seconds of not dying.
Massive ice chunk! +60 seconds of sweet, sweet oxygen!
Metal scrap acquired. This could be useful for construction.
Are you just going to float there all day?
I'm detecting your brain activity...  still searching...
You're actually getting better at this! Who knew?
That debris... it looks familiar somehow.  Have we seen this before?
